description: Describes node configuration, some of which is specific to GKE (e.g. [machine types](https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/machine-types).
title: GKE Node Configuration

___name.description: Name of node for use by k2.

___scopes.description: The scopes given to the node.

___machineType.description: The machine type that should be used for the node (n1-standard-1, etc.).

___diskSize.description: The amount of disk that should be allocated to the node, in GB.

___taints.description: List of GKE taints to associate with the kubernetes node

$eref.description: Configuration for taint for use in K2.
$eref.title: Taint Configuration

___key.description: Taint key which must match toleration

___effect.description: NoSchedule, PreferNoSchedule or NoExecute to restrict access to node
